snippet: The rookie defenseman Adam Larsson sparked the Devils in his playoff debut with a game-tying goal in Tuesday’s Game 2 victory in Philadelphia.
abstract: New Jersey Devils rookie defenseman Adam Larsson plays like a veteran in Devils 4-1 playoff win over Philadelphia Flyers in Game 2 of their NHL playoff series. (M)1
lead_paragraph: NEWARK -- Adam Larsson, the Devils' 19-year-old rookie defenseman, had grown a playoff beard, just in case he would actually get into a playoff game. His blond whiskers are thick and spiky, practically like a veteran's. ''It's pretty good right now,'' he said Wednesday, smiling.

headline.main: A Devils Rookie Regains His Edge
